item.title: Adding a (weapon) to my rsps please help not solved yet
item.dc:creator: @shabba_56 shabba 56
item.description:
@shabba_56 wrote:

hey mate i have int’s from my 474 works fine for me see if these work

if(i == ****) // change this if you need to “item number”
{
class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5];
class8.aStringArray189[1] = “Wield”;//New option
class8.anInt174 = 804; //Model ID
class8.anInt181 = 2128;//Model Zoom
class8.anInt190 = 591;//Model Rotation
class8.anInt198 = 1034;//model rotate side ways increase to move right in circle
class8.anInt204 = 138;//Unknown
class8.anInt199 = -1;//noteable
class8.anInt169 = 8;// model offset increase to move to the right
class8.anInt194 = 11;//model offset increase to move up
class8.anInt165 = 805;//male wearing
class8.anInt200 = 805;//female wearing
class8.anInt175 = -1;//Unknown
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable//Unknown
class8.anInt164 = -1;//Female arms/sleeves
class8.anInt188 = -1;//male arms/sleeves
class8.aBoolean176 = false;//Stackable
class8.aString170 = “Dragon Bow”;//Name of the new item
class8.aByteArray178 = “A bow crafted from dragon scales and dragon fire.”.getBytes();//examin info
}

change the (****) to ur own id

item.title: Adding a (weapon) to my rsps please help not solved yet
item.dc:creator: @tubefish tubefish
item.description:
@tubefish wrote:

ok i am having trouble adding a bow to my server

this is what i have so far

1)i added the weild and drop model in the model folder…via. the client

  1. i add the thing in the class8.java folder it looks like this

[size=18pt]INTS[/size] i dont know its correct please tell me if its not so i can fix it

if(i == 8005){ class8.aString170 = "Dragon Bow"; class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Wield"; class8.aStringArray189[4] = "Drop"; class8.anInt174 = 804; class8.anInt165 = 805; class8.anInt188 = -1; class8.anInt202 = 0; class8.aBoolean176 = false; class8.anInt198 = 1034; class8.anInt181 = 2128; class8.anInt155 = 120002; class8.anInt200 = 805; class8.anInt164 = -1; class8.anInt169 = 0; class8.anInt204 = 0; class8.anInt194 = 0; class8.anInt179 = 11236; class8.anInt190 = 591; class8.aByteArray178 = "The Best Bow Ever Built".getBytes(); }

  1. i compile and run the client and when i spawn the item it has the name right, has the examine right, but when i look in the inventory the picture is CORRECT and so is the wield

it Makes me invisible

2u8j8t1.jpg769×532

can anyone tell me what i put is wrong?

the wield model # is 805

drop model # is 804

item in game is 8005

****how do i make it look like the dragon bow model i put in the client files?

*** I HAVE PUT IT INTO THE ITEM.CFG***

anything else i need to do/
